price: [Recuerda al Profeta] Lot, cuando le dijo a su pueblo: "¿Cometen esa inmoralidad en público?"
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi atatūna al-fāḥishata wa-antum tub'ṣirūna
